channel.title: Express Transit on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Express Transit on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Greater Manchester Gets Support for Apple Pay Express Mode
item.description: Support for Apple Pay’s Express Mode has this week been added to the Bee Network in Greater Manchester, enabling passengers to pay for bus and tram travel without unlocking their iPhone or Apple Watch
